mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME, COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE OWNER = #{schema} AND TABLE_TYPE = 'TABLE'

SELECT T.COLUMN_NAME, T.DATA_TYPE, T.DATA_LENGTH, T.DATA_PRECISION, T.DATA_SCALE, T.NULLABLE, T.DATA_DEFAULT, C.COMMENTS, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ALL_CONSTRAINTS AC JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS ACC ON AC.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ACC.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE AC.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND AC.OWNER = T.OWNER AND AC.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME AND ACC.COLUMN_NAME = T.COLUMN_NAME) AS IS_PK FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS T LEFT JOIN ALL_COL_COMMENTS C ON T.OWNER = C.OWNER AND T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME AND T.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME WHERE T.OWNER = #{schema} AND T.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY T.COLUMN_ID
SELECT VIEW_NAME, TEXT FROM ALL_VIEWS WHERE OWNER = #{schema}
SELECT TRIGGER_NAME, STATUS FROM ALL_TRIGGERS WHERE OWNER = #{schema}

SELECT DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL(#{type}, #{tableName}, #{schema}) || NVL((SELECT CHR(10) || 'COMMENT ON TABLE "' || OWNER || '"."' || TABLE_NAME || '" IS ''' || COMMENTS || ''';' FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE OWNER = #{schema} AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND COMMENTS IS NOT NULL), '') || NVL((SELECT XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(E, CHR(10) || 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "' || OWNER || '"."' || TABLE_NAME || '"."' || COLUMN_NAME || '" IS ''' || COMMENTS || ''';')).EXTRACT('//text()').getClobVal() FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS WHERE OWNER = #{schema} AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND COMMENTS IS NOT NULL), '') FROM DUAL

SELECT A.TABLE_NAME AS SOURCE_TABLE, A.COLUMN_NAME AS SOURCE_COL, C_PK.TABLE_NAME AS TARGET_TABLE, RA.COLUMN_NAME AS TARGET_COL FROM ALL_CONS_COLUMNS A JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS C ON A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = C.CONSTRAINT_NAME JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS C_PK ON C.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME = C_PK.CONSTRAINT_NAME JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS RA ON C.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME = RA.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE C.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND (A.OWNER = #{schema} AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} OR C_PK.OWNER = #{schema} AND C_PK.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName})

SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ALL_CONSTRAINTS AC JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS ACC ON AC.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ACC.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE AC.CONSTRAINT_TYPE='P' AND AC.OWNER=T.OWNER AND AC.TABLE_NAME=T.TABLE_NAME AND ACC.COLUMN_NAME=T.COLUMN_NAME) as IS_PK FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS T WHERE OWNER = #{schema} AND TABLE_NAME IN #{t}
SELECT TABLE_NAME, COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE OWNER = #{schema} AND TABLE_NAME IN #{t}

SELECT A.TABLE_NAME, A.COLUMN_NAME FROM ALL_CONS_COLUMNS A JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS C ON A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = C.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND A.OWNER = C.OWNER JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS C_PK ON C.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME = C_PK.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND C.R_OWNER = C_PK.OWNER WHERE C.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C_PK.OWNER = #{schema} AND C_PK.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}

SELECT I.INDEX_NAME, I.INDEX_TYPE, I.UNIQUENESS, NVL((SELECT LISTAGG(C.COLUMN_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY C.COLUMN_POSITION) FROM ALL_IND_COLUMNS C WHERE C.INDEX_OWNER = I.OWNER AND C.INDEX_NAME = I.INDEX_NAME), '') AS COLUMNS FROM ALL_INDEXES I WHERE I.TABLE_OWNER = #{schema} AND I.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND I.GENERATED = 'N'

SELECT C.CONSTRAINT_NAME, A.COLUMN_NAME, C_PK.TABLE_NAME AS R_TABLE_NAME, RA.COLUMN_NAME AS R_COLUMN_NAME, C.DELETE_RULE FROM ALL_CONSTRAINTS C JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS A ON C.CONSTRAINT_NAME = A.CONSTRAINT_NAME JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS C_PK ON C.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME = C_PK.CONSTRAINT_NAME JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS RA ON C.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME = RA.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE C.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C.OWNER = #{schema} AND C.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}

SELECT ACC.COLUMN_NAME FROM ALL_CONSTRAINTS AC JOIN ALL_CONS_COLUMNS ACC ON AC.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ACC.CONSTRAINT_NAME WHERE AC.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND AC.OWNER = #{schema} AND AC.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND ROWNUM = 1
